text: Klaus Kinski, born Klaus Günter Karl Nakszynski (18 October 1926 – 23 November 1991) was a German actor. He appeared in more than 130 movies. He was famous for working with Werner Herzog and also notorious for his infamous violent outbursts. He played Count Orlok in Nosferatu the Vampyre (1979) and Vampire in Venice (1988). He was the father of actors Pola Kinski, Nastassja Kinski and Nikolai Kinski. == Other websites == * Category:1926 births Category:1991 deaths Category:German movie actors Category:Deaths from myocardial infarction
title: Klaus Kinski
